title: Chocolate and strawberry lime ice cream roll
description: Coconut cream adds richness to the ice cream in this dairy-free dessert. Equipment and preparation: you will need an ice cream maker, piping bags fitted with a nozzle coupler and writing tip attached (ideally Wilton 2), a sugar thermometer and a hand-held blender for this recipe.
ingredients: 1 lime, zest and 1 tbsp juice only
2 tbsp strawberry jam (from the cooled jam above)
30g/1oz dairy-free butter (soy spread), plus extra for greasing
